titleStmt.title: The tragi-comicall history of Alexto and Angelica Containing the progresse of a zealous Candide, and masculine love. With a various mutability of a feminine affection. Together with loves iustice thereupon. Written by Alex: Hart Esq.
titleStmt.author: Hart, Alexander, fl. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Nich: Vavasour, and are to be sold at his shop in the Inner Temple neere the Church,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The history of Alexto and Angelica.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
